CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 部分；碎片；块；片；段；段落；作品；篇章；物件；部件；零件；构件；棋子；艺术品；乐曲；文学作品；文章；报道；装置部分；拼合物；修补物；一件；一篇；一首；一支；一台
拼接；组合；接合；修补；补缀；缝合（衣物等）；逐渐理解

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指共有的东西中应占有的一部分。
指包含在全体中的一部分，暗示微不足道的一部分。
通常指按类划分或分割成而的部分。常含抽象意义。
指某物的特定部分或自然形成的部分，也指线形物品的一段。
含义广，最普通用词。常指整体中可大可小的一部分，也可指整体中可分开的独立部分。
指因破裂、分割等产生的支离破碎、不规则的一部分。
指整体中的分区，部分与部分之间有显著界限。
指整体中的一些个体，尤指从某个整体上分出来的一部分。
侧重从整体中所分配到的那一部分，含一定的独立意义。
侧重指微小，一点点，小碎片。
侧重指废弃的零碎之物。
多指切得很薄的一片食物。
指破裂的，不完整的，不可完整的碎片。
侧重指平整很薄的一张或一片。
最普通用词，多指从整体上分割下来的东西，可大可小。

word_group.brief_definition: 轻而易举的事, 举手之劳
身心崩溃, 沮丧至极
小菜一碟, 轻而易举的事
完好的；未受伤的；未损坏的；平安无恙的
人物风俗画；可作话题的东西
博物馆藏品；过时的人；老古董
参赛演奏乐曲；试件；试样
精心策划的事件；片断；结构严谨的正式演讲；精心组织与演练过的打法；烟花燃放…编排

bilingual.source: Yasmin nibbled at the piece of bread.
bilingual.target: 雅思敏啃了一小块面包。

bilingual.source: "I had wrapped it in a small piece of paper."
bilingual.target: “我用一小块纸把它包起来了。”

bilingual.source: Do you want to try a piece?

bilingual.target: 每个人都拿了一块面包。

bilingual.source: There's a piece of the puzzle on it.
Would you like to share this piece of cake?
Here is a piece of sweet cake and some medicine.
bilingual.target: 这里有一块甜蛋糕和一些药。

bilingual.source: Temples and other cultural sites were taken down piece by piece.
bilingual.target: 寺庙和其他文化遗址被一块一块地拆除。

list.abstract: Piece（英 [piːs]，美 [piːs]），英语单词，作名词为块；张；片。作动词为拼合；拼装；延伸。例句：It is a ridiculous piece of satire.（这是一篇荒谬的讽刺作品。） Piece的近义词有block、mass等，反义词有disassemble。
日本女明星新垣结衣（Aragaki Yui）第二张专辑《hug》里的流行歌曲，走抒情的路线。

yingyinNormal.en: The Serbian side was the last piece of the puzzle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 塞尔维亚方面是最后一块拼图。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey Joe. Yeah, can I get a 3-piece, some cole slaw, some beans, and a Coke, Diet Coke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊！我想要三块鸡，沙拉，豆子，还有可乐，健怡可乐。

yingyinNormal.en: Pressure. This diamond used to just be a piece of coal that was put under a lot of pressure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 压力啊。这颗钻石以前只是一小块炭，通过高压制成的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if you're to give us a piece of land, you'd better know where it is before you agree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果您愿给我们一块地，您答应前最好先知道我们要哪块地。

yingyinNormal.en: So, I think if we want to predict the height of the wave, we need to use elasticity theory and model the lattice as one continuous flexible piece.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得如果想预测起伏的高度，我们需要用到弹性理论还要将格架作为一个连续柔性块的模型。

yingyinNormal.en: Look I admit it I may have crossed a line here but come on Raj your sister is a grown woman and to her I'm a forbidden piece of white chocolate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，我承认，我是越线了，但是拉杰，得了，你妹妹都成年了，对她来说，我不过是块禁忌的白巧克力罢了。

yingyinNormal.en: Is it? Tell me this Sheriff, if your kid loves you so much, why is he leaving? You think you're special, Cowboy? You're a piece of plastic. You were made to be thrown away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？你倒是说说看啊，警长... 如果你们主人那么爱你们，干嘛要丢下你们？牛仔，你觉得自己很特别？你不过是块塑料，注定要被扔掉的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. He got reckless. Biter took a piece of him right over there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他变得很鲁莽，行尸在那边咬掉了他一块肉。

yingyinNormal.en: And they wanna piece of it. And they're not gonna go up there without you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们想要一块。没有你，他们不会去那儿。

yingyinNormal.en: Go ahead. Try a piece. Yeah, we think that Mockolate is even better than chocolate. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别客气，试一块，对，我们认为麻克力比巧克力好吃的多了。好。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure I will agree, but is that why you're here? To ask for a piece of land as the site for this thing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想我肯定会同意的，但你们过来就为这个吗？为建立纪念碑要一块地吗？

yingyinNormal.en: This map's not complete. It's just a piece. Ever since Luke disappeared, people have been looking for him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这张地图并不完整，只是其中一块，自从卢克失踪，人们就一直在找他。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me cut you a piece of the salmon. No, thank you. I'm stuffed. It's the most delicious thing on the boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来给你切块三文鱼。不用了，谢谢，我撑死了。这是船上最美味的食物了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, who? I'm gonna hang this basket on the door and when the neighbors walk by, they can all take a piece.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起，你说谁？我要在门上挂一个篮子，只要邻居一走过去，他们就可以拿一块糖果。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, I'm laying into the delivery driver, and Mitchell strolls in and says, "Oh, it's fine," and then offers him a piece of his banana loaf. I heard that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当时正在跟送货员吵架，结果米奇尔插进来说"没关系"，还给送货员一块香蕉面包。真是气人。

yingyinNormal.en: And using a fork to pick up a piece of broccoli from a Styrofoam plate without driving the fork through the plate is going to be as difficult as brain surgery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 此外， 用餐叉从一个泡沫塑料盘子里叉起一块西兰花而不叉透盘子，这难度将不亚于脑外科手术。

yingyinNormal.en: That is just a piece of the puzzle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是个障眼法。

yingyinNormal.en: Go ahead. It'll be a piece of kelp.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去吧，你没问题的。

yingyinNormal.en: What about my piece? That's a cute top.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我的呢？你这上衣很好看嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Try a piece of lettuce, George. It's yummy!
yingyinNormal.zh: 尝一片生菜，乔治。这个好吃。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The British land art, typified by Richard Long's <highlight>piece</highlight>, was not only more domestically scaled, but a lot quirkier than its American counterpart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以理查德·朗的作品为代表的英国地景艺术不仅在国内更上一层楼，而且比美国的同行发展更多变。

examination_example.sentence: Davidson’s article is one of a number of <highlight>pieces</highlight> that have recently appeared making the point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戴维森的文章只是近年来发表的众多同类文章中的一个代表。

examination_example.sentence: Subjects exposed to fast-food flashes also tend to think a musical <highlight>piece</highlight> lasts too long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接触一闪而过快餐标志的受试者们也往往会认为一段音乐持续时间太长了。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of sth that has been cut or separated from the rest of it; a standard amount of sth

examination_example.sentence: Doubtless a <highlight>piece</highlight> of boiled beef can always be served up on Sunday alongside some steamed vegetables, without the Yorkshire pudding and no wine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，人们总可以在周日把一块水煮牛肉和一些清蒸蔬菜一起端上桌，不吃约克郡布丁也不喝葡萄酒。

sense_info_list.en: one of the parts that something is made of; one of the bits or parts that sth breaks into

word_usage.usage: piece表示一篇文章; 一首音乐作品等时，为可数名词，其复数形式为pieces。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: something that has been created by an artist, musician, or writer

examination_example.sentence: One of the most significant <highlight>pieces</highlight> of news from the US in early 2017 was the efforts of Google to make autonomous driving a reality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据美媒2017年报道，谷歌正努力让无人驾驶成为现实。这是2017年初美国报道过的最重要的新闻之一。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pieces</highlight> of science journalism can also oversimplify and generalize their subject material.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学新闻界也可能过度简化和概括其主题材料。

examination_example.sentence: A 1916 <highlight>piece</highlight> by her great-niece is to be trusted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的侄孙女在1916年写那首诗的事实是可信的。

examination_example.sentence: If you want to perform better at work, select <highlight>pieces</highlight> you view as professional.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想在工作中表现得更好，请选择你认为专业的作品。

sense_info_list.en: one of the parts that something is made of

examination_example.sentence: You can purchase this 3 million <highlight>piece</highlight> of land here, because I'm guaranteeing you today you'll have 1, 000 bison on it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 您可以在这里购买这块价值三百万的土地，因为我向您保证今天您将拥有1，000头北美野牛在上面。

examination_example.sentence: And researchers are yet to answer the ultimate question of ageing: why does the body ultimately fall to <highlight>pieces</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且研究人员还没有回答衰老的终极问题:为什么身体最终会崩溃？

word_usage.usage:
piece表“片，块，段”，作单位词，常用于a piece of短语中，注意其后只接不可数名词。如需表示复数意义，须将piece改为复数。
示例：把两块木头粘在一起。
误 Glue the two piece of woods together.
正 Glue the two pieces of wood together.

当a piece of所修饰的不可数名词，带形容词修饰语时，注意该形容词通常须放在piece前，而不是它所修饰的名词前。
示例：我有一条很有趣的消息告诉你。
误 I have a piece of amusing news to tell you.
正 I have an amusing piece of news to tell you.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: She had a <highlight>piece</highlight> of chicken bone lodged in her lung.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一块鸡骨头卡在她的肺里。

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn about the <highlight>pieces</highlight> of furniture in the children's bedrooms?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于孩子们卧室里的家具，我们了解到了什么？

examination_example.sentence: As the world's food security falls to <highlight>pieces</highlight>, individual countries acting in the their own self-interest are actually worsening the troubles of many.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着世界粮食安全的崩溃，个别国家为了自身利益而采取的行动实际上正在加剧许多国家的麻烦。

sense_info_list.en: something that has been created by an artist; musician; or writer

examination_example.sentence: However, those <highlight>pieces</highlight> in the children's bedrooms are copies built to the designs of the architect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，孩子们卧室里的那些作品是按照建筑师的设计建造的复制品。

examination_example.sentence: Further, he said, the New Jersey Education Department has flagged at least two <highlight>pieces</highlight> of writing on state English language assessments in which students expressed suicidal thoughts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，他说，新泽西州教育部门在英语作业中已经发现至少有两篇文章显示出了学生有自杀的想法。

sense_info_list.en: one of the parts that something is made of

word_usage.usage:
piece表“片，块，段”，作单位词，常用于a piece of短语中，注意其后只接不可数名词。如需表示复数意义，须将piece改为复数。
示例：把两块木头粘在一起。
误 Glue the two piece of woods together.
正 Glue the two pieces of wood together.

当a piece of所修饰的不可数名词，带形容词修饰语时，注意该形容词通常须放在piece前，而不是它所修饰的名词前。
示例：我有一条很有趣的消息告诉你。
误 I have a piece of amusing news to tell you.
正 I have an amusing piece of news to tell you.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Jenna threw the burnt <highlight>piece</highlight> into the sink and put in the other slice of bread.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Jenna把烧焦的面包片扔进水槽，然后放进另一片面包。

examination_example.sentence: Here is a <highlight>piece</highlight> of news for bird lovers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里有一条给爱鸟人士的消息。

examination_example.sentence: These <highlight>pieces</highlight> can be folded into a neat little pack and fastened on your belt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些碎片可以折叠成一个整洁的小包装，系在腰带上。

sense_info_list.en: something that has been created by an artist, musician, or writer

examination_example.sentence: Some <highlight>pieces</highlight> of music can go for 40 minutes and require up to 50 page turns, including back turns for repeat passages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些音乐片段可以长达40分钟，需要多达50页的翻页，包括重复段落的向后翻页。

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>piece</highlight> from 2018, Von Wong wanted to illustrate (说明) a specific statistic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2018年的一篇文章中，冯·王想说明一个具体的统计数据。

examination_example.sentence: Among the works and masterworks on exhibition the visitor will find the best <highlight>pieces</highlight>, most importantly the Persistence of Memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在展出的作品和代表作之中，参观者能一览最佳杰作，其中最重要的是《持续的记忆》。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 一块; 一片; 一条
零件; 部件; 碎片; 碎块
件; 篇; 首; 支

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 轻而易举的事；举手之劳

sense_info_list.zh: 一块; 一片; 一条

examination_example.sentence: We often get a recipe on the phone and take it down quickly on a <highlight>piece</highlight> of paper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们经常在电话里得到一份食谱，然后很快把它记在一张纸上。

examination_example.sentence: Judie painted a butterfly on a <highlight>piece</highlight> of white paper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后朱迪在一张白纸上画了一只蝴蝶。

examination_example.sentence: It's not a dog but a cooked sausage in a long <highlight>piece</highlight> of bread.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不是一只狗，而是一块长面包中的熟香肠。

sense_info_list.en: one of the parts that something is made of
sense_info_list.zh: 零件; 部件; 碎片; 碎块

examination_example.sentence: She was also there to help me pick up the <highlight>pieces</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她也在那里帮我捡碎片，

examination_example.sentence: Cut the vegetables into small <highlight>pieces</highlight> with a knife.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用小刀把蔬菜切成小块。

examination_example.sentence: Paper can be broken into small <highlight>pieces</highlight> and made into new paper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纸可以被碎成小块，然后制成新纸。

sense_info_list.zh: 件; 篇; 首; 支

examination_example.sentence: These small <highlight>pieces</highlight> of clay art show the love that all Chinese people have for life and beauty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些小小的泥塑作品，表达了所有中国人对生活和美好事物的热爱。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>pieces</highlight> are carefully shaped by hand from a very special kind of clay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些作品是用一种非常特殊的粘土手工精心塑造的。

examination_example.sentence: The sale of a single <highlight>piece</highlight> can earn the young artist thousands of dollars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 单件作品的销售可为这位年轻艺术家带来数千美元的收入。

examination_example.sentence: The reward now goes to 50 gold <highlight>pieces</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在奖励50枚金币。

examination_example.sentence: True to his word, Shang Yang gave the man 50 gold <highlight>pieces</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商鞅信守诺言，给了他50枚金币。

examination_example.sentence: Charlie put the broken <highlight>pieces</highlight> into his pocket before he left the garden.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 查理离开花园前把碎片放进口袋里。

word_usage.usage:
piece表“片，块，段”，作单位词，常用于a piece of短语中，注意其后只接不可数名词。如需表示复数意义，须将piece改为复数。
示例：把两块木头粘在一起。
误 Glue the two piece of woods together.
正 Glue the two pieces of wood together.

当a piece of所修饰的不可数名词，带形容词修饰语时，注意该形容词通常须放在piece前，而不是它所修饰的名词前。
示例：我有一条很有趣的消息告诉你。
误 I have a piece of amusing news to tell you.
正 I have an amusing piece of news to tell you.
